thread.section_title: ClearBags Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ClearBags | clearbags.com | 9 of 472
thread.title: Christine

author: Christine
title: Christine
text:
Update: Dave was very attentive to my concerns and ClearBags sent me out replacement bags and was overnight shipped. I am very pleased with how this company handled quality issues and made it right with me. They have earned my trust and I will definitely be coming back for more orders. They have shown that they care a lot about their customers and stand behind their product!
___
